text: Richard Stanley Zemel (born 1963) is a computer scientist and professor at University of Toronto, Department of Computer Science, and a leading figure in the field of Machine Learning and Computer Vision. Zemel obtained his Ph.D under Geoffrey Hinton from University of Toronto, Department of Computer Science. ==References== ==External links== * Category:Artificial intelligence researchers Category:Harvard University alumni Category:American computer scientists Category:Canadian computer scientists Category:Living people Category:Machine learning researchers Category:University of Toronto faculty Category:Canada Research Chairs Category:Cognitive scientists Category:University of Toronto alumni Category:1963 births
title: Richard Zemel
